name: Xcom facebook friend squad
body:
![X-COM Friend Known logo](http://i.imgur.com/1t8Fo.png)
==========================

Gets Friend names from Facebook, then will populate the random soldier name list with friends' names (from appropriate countries).

Still in alpha stages!
tagline: Allows you to select facebook friends to populate squad names in XCOM: Enemy Unknown
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
